name: Pat The Peppino
description:
Pat the darn thing!!! Agh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

Buy a pep plush here (soon): fanga.me/r/pizzatower

Also note: I will add more things to this game, this is just a beta release right now.

Update 1.1:

  • Added the ability to punch peppino, which creates the game's first effects. (Note: for some reason, the game produces more effects on the desktop version than on the html5 version of the game, which is weird.)
  • Gave the game some GUI, mainly the amount of times the player has patted peppino and some small instructions on how to work the game.
  • Added a surprise that happens after too many punches to peppino.
  • Gave some general fixes to the game, increasing the size of every single hitbox and cleaning up the code a bit.
